item.title: Biden Agrees to Supply Ukraine With Anti-Personnel Mines
item.description: The decision is the latest in a series of moves by the U.S. and Russia that have escalated tensions between the two.

item.title: Middle East Airlines Has Become an Unlikely National Hero in Lebanon
item.description: Middle East Airlines has managed to fly through regional and civil wars since the 1960s. And it is still in the skies today.
